item.title: Plubo Routes
item.description: ✔️ No need to write rewrite rules and tags manually ✔️ Easily extendable with hooks ✔️ Ready to use with blade templates Getting started # composer require joanrodas/plubo-routes You can also install Plubo Routes as a standalone WordPress plugin, simply downloading the zip and placing it in the plugins folder. Adding new routes # <?php use PluboRoutes\PluboRoutesProcessor; use PluboRoutes\Route; PluboRoutesProcessor::init(); add_filter('plubo/routes', function($routes) { $routes[] = new Route( 'route_name', 'example/{city:word}/{id:number}', 'template_path' ); return $routes; }); ?
